channel.title: Web Based
channel.description:
Im new to the whole private server deal, and I was wondering if it'd be possible to upload and run the server from web hosting, so it's up 24/7... I got 2 computers available to use [mine and a friends] and neither of us can garuntee 100% up time, but I do got some hosting. The only thing I see a problem with is the server run feature, which may be a problem. Any help is appreciated.
-DebacleX[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 05:18:29 AM[/size][hr]Bring Up My Post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 04:29:06 PM[/size][hr]BUMPO
